column4: I did the check ubotu sent me. I managed to pick the Alsa mixer with no problem.
I am glad it worked out
I just plugged in my flashdrive, and didn't see Eject, but instead Unmount Volume. It seemed to work.
that was only the first part of the problem,  I seem to be having difficulties with my mp3 player  files just "jam" ,and I am wondering if it might be related
